content: the shine of silk combined with the warmth of baby alpaca makes this a luxurious cowl knit in the round with a simple linen stitch and three beautiful colors this is the perfect weekend project uses 2 braided hanks each of the 3 colors experience level advanced beginner materials * metalico 50% baby alpaca 50% silk 50g/147yds 2 hanks a 2 hanks b 2 hanks c * size 4 3 5mm 24″ circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge finished measurements * circumference 24″ * height 16¼ colors shown * sandstone no 1616 * turquoise no 1635 * jade no 1631
